extracted_content:
[
    {"Article": "3", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Response to Insufficient Progress in Renewable Energy and Energy Efficiency"},
    {"Article": "3", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "This article outlines the procedures for addressing insufficient progress towards renewable energy and energy efficiency targets within the EU."},
    {"Article": "3.1", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Response to Insufficient Progress in Renewable Energy"},
    {"Article": "3.1", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "The Commission will assess progress towards renewable energy targets and propose measures if necessary."},
    {"Article": "3.2", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Member State Obligations for Renewable Energy"},
    {"Article": "3.2", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "Member states must ensure additional measures are implemented within one year to cover gaps compared to national reference points."},
    {"Article": "3.3", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Baseline Share Requirement"},
    {"Article": "3.3", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "Member states must maintain a baseline share of energy from renewable sources equal to their 2020 target."},
    {"Article": "3.4", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Explanation for Gaps in Renewable Energy"},
    {"Article": "3.4", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "Member states must explain how they will cover gaps compared to national reference points in their next integrated report."},
    {"Article": "3.5", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Response to Insufficient Progress in Energy Efficiency"},
    {"Article": "3.5", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "The Commission will propose measures and exercise power at the union level if progress towards energy efficiency targets is insufficient."},
    {"Article": "3.6", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Reporting on Additional Measures"},
    {"Article": "3.6", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "Member states must detail additional measures in their following progress report."},
    {"Article": "3.7", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasTitle", "value": "Response to Insufficient Progress in Interconnections"},
    {"Article": "3.7", "Suffix": "", "type": "poliana:hasContent", "value": "The Commission will cooperate with member states by 2026 to address insufficient progress in interconnections."}
]
